title: A counter-buff to Lysimachus Nicanor: calling himself a Jesuite. By Philopatris
author: Mure, William, Sir, 1594-1657.
notes: A reply to "The epistle congratulatorie of Lysimachus Nicanor" by John Corbet.
Printer's name and place of publication from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
